atk-s0508a21:216: Imaṁ jātiṁ upādāya, byādhi me nupapajjatha.
atk-s0508a21:218: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:222: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṁ mātulattherassa upaṭṭhānaṁ agamāsi. Taṁ thero adhigamaṁ pucchi, taṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a21:231: Sadattho me anuppatto, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:234: Sabbe me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo.
atk-s0508a21:238: Imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi sīhanādaṁ nadanto aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a21:239_0: Tattha yaṁ patthayāno dhammesu, upajjhāyo anuggahi. Amataṁ abhikaṅkhantanti samathavipassanādīsu
atk-s0508a21:239_1: anavajjadhammesu yaṁ dhammaṁ mayhaṁ patthayanto ākaṅkhanto upajjhāyo amataṁ nibbānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:239_2: abhikaṅkhantaṁ maṁ ovādadānavasena anuggaṇhi. Kataṁ kattabbakaṁ mayāti tassa adhigamatthaṁ
atk-s0508a21:239_3: kattabbaṁ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṁ kiccaṁ kataṁ niṭṭhāpitaṁ mayā.
atk-s0508a21:240_0: Tato eva anuppatto adhigato catubbidhopi maggadhammo sacchikato. Sayaṁ dhammo anītihoti
atk-s0508a21:240_1: sayaṁ attanāyeva nibbānadhammo phaladhammo ca anītiho asandiddho attapaccakkho kato,
atk-s0508a21:240_2: “itiha, iti kirā”ti pavattiyā itihasaṅkhātaṁ saṁsayaṁ samucchindantoyeva ariyamaggo
atk-s0508a21:240_3: pavattati. Tenāha “visuddhañāṇo nikkaṅkho”tiādi. Tattha visuddhañāṇoti sabbasaṁkilesavisuddhiyā
atk-s0508a21:241_0: Sadatthoti arahattaṁ. Sikkhāti adhisīlasikkhādayo. Sussutāti pariyattibāhusaccassa
atk-s0508a21:241_1: paṭivedhabāhusaccassa ca pāripūrivasena suṭṭhu sutā. Tava sāsaneti tava ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhitassa.
atk-s0508a21:242: Ariyavatāti suvisuddhasīlādivatasamādānena. Antevāsimhi sikkhitoti tuyhaṁ samīpe ciṇṇabrahmacariyavāsatāya antevāsī sikkhitavā sikkhitaadhisīlādisikkho amhīti.
atk-s0508a21:245_0: Sādhūhītiādikā āyasmato vaḍḍhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:245_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a21:245_2: bhārukacchanagare gahapatikule nibbattitvā vaḍḍhoti laddhanāmo anupubbena vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0508a21:245_3: Athassa mātā saṁsāre sañjātasaṁvegā puttaṁ ñātīnaṁ niyyādetvā bhikkhunīnaṁ santike
atk-s0508a21:245_4: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karontī arahattaṁ pāpuṇitvā aparena samayena puttampi
atk-s0508a21:245_5: viññutaṁ pattaṁ veḷudantattherassa santike pabbājesi. So pabbajito buddhavacanaṁ
atk-s0508a21:245_6: uggahetvā bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā ganthadhuraṁ vahanto ekadivasaṁ “ekako santaruttarova
atk-s0508a21:245_7: mātaraṁ passissāmī”ti bhikkhunupassayaṁ agamāsi. Taṁ disvā mātā “kasmā tvaṁ ekako
atk-s0508a21:245_8: santaruttarova idhāgato”ti codesi. So mātarā codiyamāno “ayuttaṁ mayā kata”nti uppannasaṁvego
atk-s0508a21:245_9: vihāraṁ gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassitvā arahattaṁ patvā mātu ovādasampattipakāsanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a21:247: “Sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṁ upadaṁsayi;
atk-s0508a21:254: “Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṁsu āsavā;
atk-s0508a21:255: Sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna.
atk-s0508a21:258: Apihā nūna mayipi, vanatho te na vijjati.
atk-s0508a21:261: Jātimaraṇasaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a21:262_0: Tattha sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṁ upadaṁsayīti sādhu vata mātā mayhaṁ ovādasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0508a21:262_1: patodaṁ dasseti, tena me vīriyaṁ uttejentī uttamaṅge paññāsīse vijjhi. Yassāti yassā
atk-s0508a21:262_2: me mātuyā. Sambodhinti arahattaṁ. Ayañhettha yojanā – janettiyā me anusiṭṭho yassā
atk-s0508a21:262_3: anusāsanībhūtaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā ahaṁ āraddhavīriyo pahitatto viharanto uttamaṁ aggaphalaṁ
atk-s0508a21:263_0: Tato eva ārakattā kilesehi arahā puññakkhettatāya dakkhiṇeyyo dakkhiṇāraho amhi.
atk-s0508a21:263_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāttayassa adhigatattā tevijjo nibbānassa sacchikatattā amataddaso
atk-s0508a21:263_2: namucino mārassa senaṁ kilesavāhiniṁ bodhipakkhiyasenāya jinitvā tassa jitattāyeva
atk-s0508a21:264_0: Idāni “anāsavo”ti vuttamatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ “ajjhattañcā” ti gāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0508a21:264_1: – ajjhattaṁ ajjhattavatthukā ca bahiddhā bahiddhavatthukā ca āsavā ye mayhaṁ ariyamaggādhigamato
atk-s0508a21:264_2: pubbe vijjiṁsu upalabbhiṁsu, te sabbe anavasesā ucchinnā ariyamaggena samucchinnā
atk-s0508a21:264_3: pahīnā puna dāni kadācipi na ca uppajjeyyuṁ na uppajjissantiyevāti.
atk-s0508a21:265_0: Idāni mātu vacanaṁ aṅkusaṁ katvā attanā arahattassa adhigatattā mātaraṁ thomento
atk-s0508a21:265_1: “visāradā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha visāradā khoti ekaṁsena vigatasārajjā. Evaṁ mātu attano
atk-s0508a21:265_2: ca arahattādhigamena satthu orasaputtabhāvaṁ ullapento mātaraṁ “bhaginī”ti āha. Etamatthaṁ
atk-s0508a21:265_3: abhāsayīti etaṁ mama ovādabhūtaṁ atthaṁ abhaṇi. Evaṁ pana maṁ ovadantī na kevalaṁ
atk-s0508a21:265_4: visāradā eva, atha kho apihā nūna mayipi tava puttakepi apihā asanthavā maññe, kiṁ
atk-s0508a21:265_5: vā etena parikappanena? Vanatho te na vijjati avijjādiko vanatho tava santāne nattheva,
atk-s0508a21:266: Idāni “tayā niyojitākāreneva mayā paṭipanna”nti dassento “pariyantakata”nti osānagāthamāha, tassattho suviññeyyova.
atk-s0508a21:269_0: Atthāyavata metiādikā āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:269_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a21:269_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ
atk-s0508a21:269_3: disvā pasannamānaso attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṁ manosilāvaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0508a21:269_4: ekaṁ ambaphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a21:269_5: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa bhātā hutvā nibbatto. Vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a21:269_6: gharāvāsaṁ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṁ nerañjarāya
atk-s0508a21:269_7: nadiyā tīre assamaṁ māpetvā viharati. Nadītīre vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca
atk-s0508a21:269_8: nadīkassapoti samaññā ahosi. Tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṁ
atk-s0508a21:269_9: adāsi. Taṁ sabbaṁ khandhake āgatameva. So bhagavato ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahatte
atk-s0508a21:279: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito aparabhāge attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā diṭṭhisamugghātakittanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a21:281: “Atthāya vata me buddho, nadiṁ nerañjaraṁ agā;
atk-s0508a21:296_0: Tattha atthāya vata meti mayhaṁ atthāya vata hitāya vata. Buddhoti sabbaññubuddho.
atk-s0508a21:296_1: Nadiṁ nerañjaraṁ agāti nerañjarāsaṅkhātaṁ nadiṁ agañchi, tassā nadiyā tīre ca mama
atk-s0508a21:297_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṁ vivarituṁ “yassāha”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Yassāti yassa buddhassa
atk-s0508a21:297_1: bhagavato. Dhammaṁ sutvānāti catusaccapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā, sotadvārānusārena
atk-s0508a21:298_1: Tattha yajiṁ uccāvace yaññeti pākaṭayaññe somayāgavājapeyyādike nānāvidhe yaññe yajiṁ.
atk-s0508a21:298_2: Aggihuttaṁ juhiṁ ahanti tesaṁ yaññānaṁ yajanavasena āhutiṁ paggaṇhanto aggiṁ paricariṁ.
atk-s0508a21:298_3: Esā suddhīti maññantoti esā yaññakiriyā aggipāricariyā suddhihetubhāvato suddhi “evaṁ
atk-s0508a21:298_4: me saṁsārasuddhi hotī”ti maññamāno. Andhabhūto puthujjanoti paññācakkhuvekallena
atk-s0508a21:298_5: avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthujjano hutvā vanagahanapabbatagahanādīni viya duratikkamanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a21:298_6: diṭṭhiyeva gahanaṁ diṭṭhigahanaṁ, taṁ pakkhando anupaviṭṭhoti diṭṭhigahanapakkhando.
atk-s0508a21:298_7: Parāmāsenāti dhammasabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā “idameva sacca”nti parāmasanato parāmāsasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a21:298_8: micchābhinivesena. Mohitoti mūḷhabhāvaṁ pāpito. Asuddhiṁ maññisaṁ suddhinti asuddhiṁ
atk-s0508a21:298_9: maggaṁ “suddhiṁ magga”nti maññisaṁ maññiṁ. Tattha kāraṇamāha “andhabhūto aviddasū”ti.
atk-s0508a21:298_10: Yasmā avijjāya andhabhūto, tato eva dhammādhammaṁ yuttāyuttañca avidvā, tasmā tathā maññinti attho.
atk-s0508a21:299_0: Micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā meti evaṁbhūtassa pana satthu sammukhā catusaccagabbhaṁ dhammakathaṁ
atk-s0508a21:299_1: sutvā yoniso paṭipajjantassa ariyamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi samucchedappahānavasena
atk-s0508a21:299_2: mayhaṁ pahīnā. Bhavāti kāmabhavādayo sabbepi bhavā ariyamaggasatthena vidālitā viddhaṁsitā.
atk-s0508a21:299_3: Juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti āhavanīyādike aggī chaḍḍetvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya
atk-s0508a21:299_4: sabbassa ca pāpassa dahanato dakkhiṇeyyaggiṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ juhāmi paricarāmi. Tayidaṁ
atk-s0508a21:299_6: āha “namassāmi tathāgata”nti. Atha vā juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyagginti dāyakānaṁ dakkhiṇāya
atk-s0508a21:299_7: mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena pāpassa ca dahanena dakkhiṇeyyaggibhūtaṁ attānaṁ juhāmi paricarāmi
atk-s0508a21:299_8: tathā katvā paricarāmi, tathā katvā pariharāmi. Pubbe aggidevaṁ namassāmi, idāni
atk-s0508a21:300_0: Mohā sabbe pahīnā meti dukkhe aññāṇādibhedā sabbe mohā mayhaṁ pahīnā samucchinnā,
atk-s0508a21:300_1: tato eva “bhavataṇhā padālitā. Vikkhīṇo jātisaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti tīsu
atk-s0508a21:303_0: Pātomajjhanhikantiādikā āyasmato gayākassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:303_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁse
atk-s0508a21:303_2: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a21:303_3: gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṁ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0508a21:303_4: vasati. Tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpena gacchati. So bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a21:303_5: disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ ṭhito velaṁ oloketvā manoharāni
atk-s0508a21:303_6: kolaphalāni satthu upanesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a21:303_7: buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṁ
atk-s0508a21:303_8: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṁ gayāyaṁ viharati. Gayāyaṁ
atk-s0508a21:303_9: vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca gayākassapoti samaññā ahosi. So bhagavatā saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a21:303_10: parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṁ datvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a21:306: “Tamhi kāle sikhī buddho, eko adutiyo ahu;
atk-s0508a21:313: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā pāpapavāhanakittanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a21:318: “Yaṁ mayā pakataṁ pāpaṁ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu;
atk-s0508a21:319: Taṁ dānīdha pavāhemi, evaṁdiṭṭhi pure ahuṁ.
atk-s0508a21:325: Suddho suddhassa dāyādo, putto buddhassa oraso.
atk-s0508a21:328: Tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṁ, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0508a21:330_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṁ saṅkhepattho – pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṁ, majjhanhikaṁ
atk-s0508a21:330_1: majjhanhavelāyaṁ, sāyaṁ sāyanhavelāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṁ tayo vāre ahaṁ udakaṁ
atk-s0508a21:330_2: otariṁ ogāhiṁ. Otaranto ca sohaṁ na yattha katthaci yadā vā tadā vā otariṁ, atha
atk-s0508a21:330_3: kho gayāya mahājanassa “pāpapavāhana”nti abhisammate gayātitthe, gayaphagguyā gayāphaggunāmake
atk-s0508a21:331_0: Idāni tadā yenādhippāyena udakorohanamanuyuttaṁ, taṁ dassetuṁ “yaṁ mayā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a21:331_1: Tassattho – “yaṁ mayā pubbe ito aññāsu jātīsu pāpakammaṁ upacitaṁ. Taṁ idāni idha
atk-s0508a21:331_2: gayātitthe imissā ca gayāphagguyā iminā udakorohanena pavāhemi apanemi vikkhālemī”ti.
atk-s0508a21:331_3: Pure satthu sāsanupagamanato pubbe evaṁdiṭṭhi evarūpaviparītadassano ahuṁ ahosiṁ.
atk-s0508a21:332_0: Dhammatthasahitaṁ padanti vibhattialopena niddeso. Dhammena ca atthena ca sahitakoṭṭhāsaṁ,
atk-s0508a21:332_1: ādito majjhato pariyosānato ca dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ atthūpasaṁhitaṁ suṭṭhu ekantena niyyānikaṁ
atk-s0508a21:332_2: katvā bhāsitaṁ vācaṁ sammāsambuddhavacanaṁ sutvā tena pakāsitaṁ paramatthabhāvena
atk-s0508a21:332_3: tacchabhāvato tathaṁ yathārahaṁ pavattinivattiupāyabhāve byabhicārābhāvato yāthāvakaṁ
atk-s0508a21:332_4: dukkhādiatthaṁ yoniso upāyena pariññeyyādibhāvena paccavekkhisaṁ “dukkhaṁ pariññeyyaṁ,
atk-s0508a21:332_5: samudayo pahātabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo, maggo bhāvetabbo”ti patiavekkhiṁ, ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0508a21:333_0: Ninhātasabbapāpomhīti evaṁ paṭividdhasaccattā eva ariyamaggajalena vikkhālitasabbapāpo
atk-s0508a21:333_1: amhi. Tato eva rāgamalādīnaṁ abhāvena nimmalattā nimmalo. Tato eva parisuddhakāyasamācāratāya
atk-s0508a21:333_3: suddhassa buddhassa bhagavato lokuttaradhammadāyassa ādiyanato dāyādo. Tasseva desanāñāṇasamuṭṭhānaurovāyāmajanitābhijātitāya
atk-s0508a21:334_0: Punapi attano paramatthato nhātakabhāvameva vibhāvetuṁ “ogayhā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0508a21:334_1: Tattha ogayhāti ogāhetvā anupavisitvā. Aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ sotanti sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānabhūtaṁ
atk-s0508a21:334_2: maggasotaṁ. Sabbapāpaṁ pavāhayinti anavasesaṁ pāpamalaṁ pakkhālesiṁ, ariyamaggajalapavāhanena
atk-s0508a21:334_3: paramatthanhātako ahosiṁ. Tato eva tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṁ, kataṁ buddhassa sāsananti vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a21:337_0: Vātarogābhinītotiādikā āyasmato vakkalittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:337_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a21:337_2: haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto satthu santikaṁ gacchantehi upāsakehi
atk-s0508a21:337_3: saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ
atk-s0508a21:337_4: saddhādhimuttānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthento sattāhaṁ
atk-s0508a21:337_5: mahādānaṁ datvā paṇidhānaṁ akāsi. Satthā tassa anantarāyataṁ disvā byākari.
atk-s0508a21:338_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṁ
atk-s0508a21:338_1: brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, vakkalītissa nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0508a21:338_2: brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṁ gato satthāraṁ disvā rūpakāyassa sampattidassanena atitto
atk-s0508a21:338_3: satthārā saddhiṁyeva vicarati. “Agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṁ satthāraṁ daṭṭhuṁ
atk-s0508a21:338_4: na labhissāmī”ti satthu santike pabbajitvā ṭhapetvā bhojanavelaṁ sarīrakiccakālañca
atk-s0508a21:338_5: sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṁ passituṁ, tattha ṭhito aññaṁ kiccaṁ pahāya
atk-s0508a21:338_6: bhagavantaṁ olokentova viharati. Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṁ āgamento bahukālaṁ tasmiṁ
atk-s0508a21:338_7: rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā punekadivasaṁ “kiṁ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena
atk-s0508a21:338_8: diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṁ passati, so maṁ passati. Yo maṁ passati, so dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a21:338_9: passati. Dhammañhi, vakkali, passanto maṁ passati, maṁ passanto dhammaṁ passatī”ti āha.
atk-s0508a21:339_0: Satthari evaṁ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṁ pahāya aññattha gantuṁ na sakkoti.
atk-s0508a21:339_1: Tato satthā “nāyaṁ bhikkhu saṁvegaṁ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti vassūpanāyikadivase
atk-s0508a21:339_2: “apehi, vakkalī”ti theraṁ paṇāmesi. So satthārā paṇāmito sammukhe ṭhātuṁ asakkonto
atk-s0508a21:339_3: “kiṁ mayhaṁ jīvitena, yohaṁ satthāraṁ daṭṭhuṁ na labhāmī”ti gijjhakūṭapabbate papātaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:339_4: abhiruhi. Satthā tassa taṁ pavattiṁ ñatvā “ayaṁ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṁ alabhanto
atk-s0508a21:339_5: maggaphalānaṁ upanissayaṁ nāseyyā”ti attānaṁ dassetuṁ obhāsaṁ vissajjento –
atk-s0508a21:342_0: Gāthaṁ vatvā “ehi, vakkalī”ti hatthaṁ pasāresi. Thero “dasabalo me diṭṭho, ‘ehī’ti
atk-s0508a21:342_1: avhānampi laddha”nti balavapītisomanassaṁ uppādetvā “kuto āgacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a21:342_2: ajānitvā satthu sammukhe ākāse pakkhandanto paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā
atk-s0508a21:342_3: vuttagāthaṁ āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṁ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a21:343_0: Idha pana evaṁ vadanti – “kiṁ te, vakkalī”tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe viharanto
atk-s0508a21:343_1: vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapesi, tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṁ na otarati,
atk-s0508a21:343_2: bhagavā taṁ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ sodhetvā adāsi. Puna vipassanaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetuṁ
atk-s0508a21:343_3: nāsakkhiyeva, athassa āhāravekallena vātābādho uppajji, taṁ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:361_0: Tattha vātarogābhinītoti vātābādhena aseribhāvaṁ upanīto, vātabyādhinā abhibhūto.
atk-s0508a21:361_1: Tvanti theraṁ ālapati. Viharanti tena iriyāpathavihārena viharanto. Kānane vaneti
atk-s0508a21:361_2: kānanabhūte vane, mahāaraññeti attho. Paviddhagocareti vissaṭṭhagocare dullabhapaccaye.
atk-s0508a21:361_3: Vātarogassa sappāyānaṁ sappiādibhesajjānaṁ abhāvena pharusabhūmibhāgatāya ca lūkhe
atk-s0508a21:361_4: lūkhaṭṭhāne. Kathaṁ bhikkhu karissasīti bhikkhu tvaṁ kathaṁ viharissasīti bhagavā pucchi.
atk-s0508a21:362_0: Taṁ sutvā thero nirāmisapītisomanassādinā attano sukhavihāraṁ pakāsento “pītisukhenā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0508a21:362_1: Tattha pītisukhenāti ubbegalakkhaṇāya pharaṇalakkhaṇāya ca pītiyā taṁsampayuttasukhena
atk-s0508a21:362_2: ca. Tenāha “vipulenā”ti uḷārenāti attho. Pharamāno samussayanti yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhitehi
atk-s0508a21:362_3: paṇītehi rūpehi sakalaṁ kāyaṁ pharāpento nirantaraṁ phuṭaṁ karonto. Lūkhampi abhisambhontoti
atk-s0508a21:362_4: araññāvāsajanitaṁ sallekhavuttihetukaṁ dussahampi paccayalūkhaṁ abhibhavanto adhivāsento.
atk-s0508a21:362_5: Viharissāmi kānaneti jhānasukhena vipassanāsukhena ca araññāyatane viharissāmīti
atk-s0508a21:364: Labhatī pītipāmojjaṁ, amataṁ taṁ vijānata”nti ca. ;
atk-s0508a21:365_0: Bhāvento satipaṭṭhāneti maggapariyāpanne kāyānupassanādike cattāro satipaṭṭhāne uppādento
atk-s0508a21:365_1: vaḍḍhento ca. Indriyānīti maggapariyāpannāni eva saddhādīni pañcindriyāni. Balānīti
atk-s0508a21:365_2: tathā saddhādīni pañca balāni. Bojjhaṅgānīti tathā satisambojjhaṅgādīni satta bojjhaṅgāni.
atk-s0508a21:365_3: Ca-saddena sammappadhānaiddhipādamaggaṅgāni saṅgaṇhāti. Tadavinābhāvato hi taggahaṇeneva
atk-s0508a21:365_4: tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ hoti. Viharissāmīti yathāvutte bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvento maggasukhena
atk-s0508a21:366_1: patipesitacitte. Niccaṁ daḷhaparakkameti sabbakālaṁ asithilavīriye. Avivādavasena
atk-s0508a21:366_2: kāyasāmaggidānavasena ca samagge. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena sahite sabrahmacārī disvā.
atk-s0508a21:367_0: Anussaranto sambuddhanti sammā sāmaṁ sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṁ sabbasattuttamatāya,
atk-s0508a21:367_1: aggaṁ uttamena damathena dantaṁ, anuttarasamādhinā samāhitaṁ atandito analaso hutvā,
atk-s0508a21:367_2: rattindivaṁ sabbakālaṁ “itipi so bhagavā araha”ntiādinā anussaranto viharissāmi.
atk-s0508a21:368: Evaṁ pana vatvā thero vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a21:380: Rañjayaṁ parisaṁ sabbaṁ, santhavī sāvakaṁ sakaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:382: Natthi etādiso añño, yathāyaṁ bhikkhu vakkali.
atk-s0508a21:384: Hutvā sutvā ca taṁ vākyaṁ, taṁ ṭhānamabhirocayiṁ.
atk-s0508a21:389: “Yo so tayā santhavito, ito sattamake muni;
atk-s0508a21:390: Bhikkhu saddhāvataṁ aggo, tādiso homahaṁ mune.
atk-s0508a21:400: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a21:402: Vakkali nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
atk-s0508a21:406: Sāvatthiyaṁ pure jāto, kule aññatare ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:410: Imaṁ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṁ hohi nāyaka.
atk-s0508a21:411: “Tadā paṭiggahi so maṁ, bhītānaṁ saraṇo muni;
atk-s0508a21:420: Alaṁ vakkali kiṁ rūpe, ramase bālanandite.
atk-s0508a21:421: “Yo hi passati saddhammaṁ, so maṁ passati paṇḍito;
atk-s0508a21:422: Apassamāno saddhammaṁ, maṁ passampi na passati.
atk-s0508a21:430: Vakkalīti jino vācaṁ, taṁ sutvā mudito ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:440: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi. Atha naṁ satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno saddhādhimuttānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0508a21:443_0: Olaggessāmītiādikā āyasmato vijitasenattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:443_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto atthadassissa
atk-s0508a21:443_2: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto gharāvāsaṁ pahāya isipabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a21:443_3: pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ākāsena gacchantaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso pasannākāraṁ
atk-s0508a21:443_4: dassento añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ ñatvā ākāsato otari. So
atk-s0508a21:443_5: bhagavato manoharāni madhurāni phalāni upanesi, paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṁ upādāya.
atk-s0508a21:443_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe hatthācariyakule
atk-s0508a21:443_7: nibbattitvā vijitasenoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ pāpuṇi. Tassa mātulā seno ca upaseno
atk-s0508a21:443_8: cāti dve hatthācariyā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajitvā vāsadhuraṁ
atk-s0508a21:443_9: pūrentā arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu. Vijitasenopi hatthisippe nipphattiṁ gato nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a21:443_10: gharāvāse alaggamānaso satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātulattherānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:443_11: santike pabbajitvā tesaṁ ovādānusāsaniyā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto vipassanāvīthiṁ
atk-s0508a21:443_12: laṅghitvā bahiddhā nānārammaṇe vidhāvantaṁ attano cittaṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a21:446: Na taṁ pāpe niyojessaṁ, kāmajālaṁ sarīrajaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:448: “Tvaṁ olaggo na gacchasi, dvāravivaraṁ gajova alabhanto;
atk-s0508a21:449: Na ca cittakali punappunaṁ, pasakka pāparato carissasi.
atk-s0508a21:452: Balavā āvatteti akāmaṁ, evaṁ āvattayissaṁ taṁ.
atk-s0508a21:455: Evaṁ damayissaṁ taṁ, patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesu.
atk-s0508a21:458: Vīriyadhuraniggahito, na yito dūraṁ gamissase cittā”ti. –
atk-s0508a21:460_0: Tattha olaggessāmīti saṁvarissāmi nivāressāmi. Teti taṁ. Upayogatthe hi idaṁ sāmivacanaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:460_1: Te gamananti vā vacanaseso. Hatthinanti ca hatthinti attho. Cittāti attano cittaṁ
atk-s0508a21:460_2: ālapati. Yathā taṁ vāretukāmo, taṁ dassento “āṇidvāreva hatthina”nti āha. Āṇidvāraṁ
atk-s0508a21:460_3: nāma pākārabaddhassa nagarassa khuddakadvāraṁ, yaṁ ghaṭikāchidde āṇimhi pakkhitte
atk-s0508a21:460_4: yantena vinā abbhantare ṭhitehipi vivarituṁ na sakkā. Yena manussagavassamahiṁsādayo
atk-s0508a21:460_5: na niggantuṁ sakkā. Nagarato bahi niggantukāmampi hatthiṁ yato palobhetvā hatthācariyo
atk-s0508a21:460_6: gamanaṁ nivāresi. Atha vā āṇidvāraṁ nāma palighadvāraṁ. Tattha hi tiriyaṁ palighaṁ
atk-s0508a21:460_7: ṭhapetvā rukkhasūcisaṅkhātaṁ āṇiṁ palighasīse āvuṇanti. Pāpeti rūpādīsu uppajjanakaabhijjhādipāpadhamme
atk-s0508a21:460_8: taṁ na niyojessaṁ na niyojissāmi. Kāmajālāti kāmassa jālabhūtaṁ. Yathā hi macchabandhamigaluddānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:460_9: jālaṁ nāma macchādīnaṁ tesaṁ yathākāmakārasādhanaṁ, evaṁ ayonisomanasikārānupātitaṁ
atk-s0508a21:460_10: cittaṁ mārassa kāmakārasādhanaṁ. Tena hi so satte anatthesu pāteti. Sarīrajāti sarīresu
atk-s0508a21:460_11: uppajjanaka. Pañcavokārabhave hi cittaṁ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttitāya “sarīraja”nti vuccati.
atk-s0508a21:461_0: Tvaṁ olaggo na gacchasīti tvaṁ, cittakali, mayā satipaññāpatodaaṅkusehi vārito na
atk-s0508a21:461_1: dāni yathāruciṁ gamissasi, ayonisomanasikāravasena yathākāmaṁ vattituṁ na labhissasi.
atk-s0508a21:461_2: Yathā kiṁ? Dvāravivaraṁ gajova alabhanto nagarato gajanirodhato vā niggamanāya dvāravivarakaṁ
atk-s0508a21:461_3: alabhamāno hatthī viya. Cittakalīti cittakāḷakaṇṇi. Punappunanti aparāparaṁ. Pasakkāti
atk-s0508a21:461_4: saraṇasampassāsavasena. Pāparatoti pāpakammanirato pubbe viya idāni na carissasi
atk-s0508a21:462_0: Adantanti adamitaṁ hatthisikkhaṁ asikkhitaṁ. Navaggahanti aciragahitaṁ. Aṅkusaggahoti
atk-s0508a21:462_1: hatthācariyo. Balavāti kāyabalena ñāṇabalena ca balavā. Āvatteti akāmanti anicchantameva
atk-s0508a21:462_2: nisedhanato nivatteti. Evaṁ āvattayissanti yathā yathāvuttaṁ hatthiṁ hatthācariyo,
atk-s0508a21:462_3: evaṁ taṁ cittaṁ cittakaliṁ duccaritanisedhanato nivattayissāmi.
atk-s0508a21:463_0: Varahayadamakusaloti uttamānaṁ assadammānaṁ damane kusalo. Tato eva sārathipavaro
atk-s0508a21:463_1: assadammasārathīsu visiṭṭho dameti ājaññaṁ ājānīyaṁ assadammaṁ desakālānurūpaṁ saṇhapharusehi
atk-s0508a21:463_2: dameti vineti nibbisevanaṁ karoti. Patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesūti saddhādīsu pañcasu
atk-s0508a21:463_3: balesu patiṭṭhito hutvā assaddhiyādinisedhanato taṁ damayissaṁ damessāmīti attho.
atk-s0508a21:464_0: Satiyātaṁ nibandhissanti gocarajjhattato bahi gantuṁ adento satiyottena kammaṭṭhānathambhe,
atk-s0508a21:464_1: cittakali, taṁ nibandhissāmi niyamessāmi. Payutto te damessāmīti tattha nibandhanto
atk-s0508a21:464_2: eva yuttappayutto hutvā te damessāmi, saṁkilesamalato taṁ visodhessāmi. Vīriyadhuraniggahitoti
atk-s0508a21:464_3: yathāvutto chekena susārathinā yuge yojito yuganiggahito yugantaragato taṁ nātikkamati,
atk-s0508a21:464_4: evaṁ tvampi citta, mama vīriyadhure niggahito sakkaccakāritāya sātaccakāritāya aññathā
atk-s0508a21:464_5: vattituṁ alabhanto ito gocarajjhattato dūraṁ bahi na gamissasi. Bhāvanānuyuttassa
atk-s0508a21:464_6: hi kammaṭṭhānato aññaṁ āsannampi lakkhaṇato dūramevāti evaṁ thero imāhi gāthāhi attano
atk-s0508a21:464_7: cittaṁ niggaṇhantova vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a21:468: Anukampatu maṁ buddho, bhikkhaṁ icchāmi dātave.
atk-s0508a21:474: Tattha cittaṁ pasādetvā, abhivandiṁ tadā jinaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:478: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākarontopi imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a21:481_0: Upārambhacittotiādikā āyasmato yasadattattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:481_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacini. Tathā hesa padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a21:481_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato
atk-s0508a21:481_3: kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a21:481_4: añjaliṁ paggayha abhitthavi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a21:481_5: buddhuppāde mallaraṭṭhe mallarājakule nibbattitvā yasadattoti laddhanāmo, vayappatto
atk-s0508a21:481_6: takkasilaṁ gantvā sabbasippāni sikkhitvā sabhiyena paribbājakena saddhiṁyeva cārikaṁ
atk-s0508a21:481_7: caramāno, anupubbena sāvatthiyaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā sabhiyena puṭṭhapañhesu
atk-s0508a21:481_8: vissajjiyamānesu sayaṁ otārāpekkho suṇanto nisīdi “samaṇassa gotamassa vāde dosaṁ
atk-s0508a21:481_9: dassāmī”ti. Athassa bhagavā cittācāraṁ ñatvā sabhiyasuttadesanāvasāne ovādaṁ dento –
atk-s0508a21:484: Ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaso pathavī yathā.
atk-s0508a21:493: Na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṁva pūtikaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:499_0: Tattha upārambhacittoti sārambhacitto, dosāropanādhippāyoti attho. Dummedhoti nippañño.
atk-s0508a21:499_1: Ārakā hoti saddhammāti so tādiso puggalo nabhaso viya pathavī paṭipattisaddhammatopi
atk-s0508a21:499_2: dūre hoti, pageva paṭivedhasaddhammato. “Na tvaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāsī”tiādinā
atk-s0508a21:500_1: nihīyati. Parisussatīti visussati kāyacittānaṁ pīṇanarasassa pītipāmojjādikusaladhammassābhāvato.
atk-s0508a21:500_2: Na virūhatīti virūḷhiṁ vuddhiṁ na pāpuṇāti. Pūtikanti gomayalepadānādiabhāvena pūtibhāvaṁ pattaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:501_0: Tuṭṭhena cittenāti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṁ, attamano pamudito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0508a21:501_1: Khepetvāti samucchinditvā. Akuppatanti arahattaṁ. Pappuyyāti pāpuṇitvā. Paramaṁ santinti
atk-s0508a21:501_2: anupādisesaṁ nibbānaṁ. Tadadhigamo cassa kevalaṁ kālāgamanameva, na kocividhoti taṁ
atk-s0508a21:502: Evaṁ satthārā ovadito saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a21:506: Ekaṁsaṁ ajinaṁ katvā, buddhaseṭṭhaṁ thaviṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:510: Ñāṇe te upamā natthi, yāvatā jagato gati.
atk-s0508a21:516: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0508a21:519_0: Upasampadāca me laddhātiādikā āyasmato soṇassa kuṭikaṇṇassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ
atk-s0508a21:519_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno seṭṭhi hutvā uḷārāya
atk-s0508a21:519_2: issariyasampattiyā ṭhito ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivutaṁ mahatiyā
atk-s0508a21:519_3: buddhalīḷāya mahantena buddhānubhāvena nagaraṁ pavisantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā
atk-s0508a21:519_4: añjaliṁ katvā aṭṭhāsi. So pacchābhattaṁ upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā bhagavato
atk-s0508a21:519_5: santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ
atk-s0508a21:519_6: disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānaṁ patthetvā mahādānaṁ datvā paṇidhānaṁ akāsi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0508a21:519_7: anantarāyataṁ disvā “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:520_0: So tattha yāvajīvaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a21:520_1: sāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭivattāni pūrento ekassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṁ sibbitvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a21:520_2: Puna buddhasuññe loke bārāṇasiyaṁ tunnavāyo hutvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa cīvarakoṭiṁ
atk-s0508a21:520_3: chinnaṁ ghaṭetvā adāsi. Evaṁ tattha tattha puññāni katvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe
atk-s0508a21:520_4: kuraraghare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti. Soṇotissa nāmaṁ akaṁsu.
atk-s0508a21:520_5: Koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena “koṭikaṇṇo”ti vattabbe kuṭikaṇṇoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a21:521_0: So anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā kuṭumbaṁ saṇṭhapento āyasmante mahākaccāne kulagharaṁ nissāya
atk-s0508a21:521_1: pavattapabbate viharante tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a21:521_2: taṁ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi. So aparabhāge saṁsāre sañjātasaṁvego therassa santike
atk-s0508a21:521_3: pabbajitvā kicchena kasirena dasavaggaṁ saṅghaṁ sannipātetvā upasampajjitvā katipayakālaṁ
atk-s0508a21:521_4: therassa santike vasitvā, theraṁ āpucchitvā satthāraṁ vandituṁ sāvatthiṁ upagato,
atk-s0508a21:521_5: satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṁ vāsaṁ labhitvā paccūsasamaye ajjhiṭṭho soḷasaaṭṭhakavaggiyānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:521_6: ussāraṇena sādhukāraṁ datvā bhāsitāya “disvā ādīnavaṁ loke”ti udānagāthāya pariyosāne
atk-s0508a21:521_7: vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne –
atk-s0508a21:527: Sayaṁ vīṇā pavajjanti, buddhassa pavisato puraṁ.
atk-s0508a21:530: “Aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a21:535_0: Arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano upajjhāyena ācikkhitaniyāmena paccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0508a21:535_1: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā, dhuvanhānaṁ, cammattharaṇaṁ, guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṁ,
atk-s0508a21:535_2: cīvaravippavāsoti pañca vare yācitvā te satthu santikā labhitvā punadeva attano vasitaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:535_3: gantvā upajjhāyassa tamatthaṁ ārocesi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana udānaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
atk-s0508a21:535_4: āgatanayena veditabbo. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “upasampanno hutvā attano upajjhāyassa
atk-s0508a21:535_5: santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇī”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a21:536: So aparabhāge vimuttisukhena viharanto attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena –
atk-s0508a21:538: “Upasampadā ca me laddhā, vimutto camhi anāsavo;
atk-s0508a21:539: So ca me bhagavā diṭṭho, vihāre ca sahāvasiṁ.
atk-s0508a21:553_0: Tattha upasampadā ca me laddhāti yā sā kicchena dasavaggaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātetvā
atk-s0508a21:553_1: attanā laddhā upasampadā. Yā ca pana varadānavasena sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0508a21:553_2: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena satthārā anuññātā upasampadā, tadubhayaṁ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0508a21:553_3: Ca-saddo samuccayattho, tena itarepi satthu santikā laddhavare saṅgaṇhāti. Vimutto
atk-s0508a21:553_4: camhi anāsavoti aggamaggena sakalakilesavatthuvimuttiyā vimutto ca amhi. Tato eva
atk-s0508a21:553_5: kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo amhīti yojanā. So ca me bhagavā diṭṭhoti yadatthaṁ ahaṁ avantiraṭṭhato
atk-s0508a21:553_6: sāvatthiṁ gato, so ca bhagavā mayā adiṭṭhapubbo diṭṭho. Vihāre ca sahāvasinti na
atk-s0508a21:553_7: kevalaṁ tassa bhagavato dassanameva mayā laddhaṁ, atha kho vihāre satthu gandhakuṭiyaṁ
atk-s0508a21:553_8: satthārā kāraṇaṁ sallakkhetvā vāsentena saha avasiṁ. “Vihāreti vihārasamīpe”ti keci.
atk-s0508a21:554_0: Bahudeva rattinti paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dhammadesanāvasena kammaṭṭhānasodhanavasena
atk-s0508a21:554_1: ca, majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ devānaṁ brahmūnañca kaṅkhacchedanavasena bhagavā bahudeva rattiṁ
atk-s0508a21:554_2: abbhokāse atināmayi vītināmesi. Vihārakusaloti dibbabrahmaāneñjaariyavihāresu kusalo.
atk-s0508a21:554_3: Vihāraṁ pāvisīti ativelaṁ nisajjacaṅkamehi uppannaparissamavinodanatthaṁ gandhakuṭiṁ pāvisi.
atk-s0508a21:555_0: Santharitvāna saṅghāṭiṁ, seyyaṁ kappesīti catugguṇaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṁ
atk-s0508a21:555_1: kappesi. Tenāha “gotamo sīho selaguhāyaṁva pahīnabhayabheravo”ti. Tattha gotamoti
atk-s0508a21:555_2: bhagavantaṁ gottena kitteti. Sīho selaguhāyaṁvāti selassa pabbatassa guhāyaṁ. Yathā
atk-s0508a21:555_3: sīho migarājā tejussadatāya pahīnabhayabheravo dakkhiṇena passena pāde pādaṁ accādhāya
atk-s0508a21:555_4: seyyaṁ kappesi, evaṁ cittutrāsalomahaṁsanachambhitattahetūnaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā
atk-s0508a21:555_5: pahīnabhayabheravo gotamo bhagavā seyyaṁ kappesīti attho.
atk-s0508a21:556_0: Tatoti pacchā, sīhaseyyaṁ kappetvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā “paṭibhātu taṁ bhikkhu dhammo
atk-s0508a21:556_1: bhāsitu”nti satthārā ajjhesitoti attho. Kalyāṇavākkaraṇoti sundaravacīkaraṇo, lakkhaṇasampannavacanakkamoti
atk-s0508a21:556_2: attho. Soṇo abhāsi saddhammanti soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyasuttāni soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo, buddhaseṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a21:556_3: sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā, paccakkhato abhāsīti thero attānameva paraṁ viya avoca.
atk-s0508a21:557_0: Pañcakkhandhe pariññāyāti pañcupādānakkhandhe tīhipi pariññāhi parijānitvā te parijānantoyeva,
atk-s0508a21:557_1: añjasaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvayitvā, paramaṁ santiṁ nibbānaṁ pappuyya pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0508a21:557_2: ṭhito anāsavo. Tato eva idāni parinibbissati anupādisesanibbānavasena nibbāyissatīti.
atk-s0508a21:560_0: Yoeva garūnantiādikā āyasmato kosiyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a21:560_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a21:560_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a21:560_3: ucchukhaṇḍikaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a21:560_4: magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, kosiyotissa gottavasena nāmaṁ akāsi. So viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a21:560_5: patto āyasmantaṁ dhammasenāpatiṁ abhiṇhaṁ upasaṅkamati, tassa santike dhammaṁ suṇāti.
atk-s0508a21:560_6: So tena sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a21:568: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā garuvāsaṁ sappurisūpanissayañca pasaṁsanto –
atk-s0508a21:570: “Yo ve garūnaṁ vacanaññu dhīro, vase ca tamhi janayetha pemaṁ;
atk-s0508a21:571: So bhattimā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a21:574: So thāmavā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a21:576: “Yo ve samuddova ṭhito anejo, gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī;
atk-s0508a21:577: Asaṁhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a21:579: “Bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī;
atk-s0508a21:580: So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa.
atk-s0508a21:587_0: Tattha yoti khattiyādīsu catūsu parisāsu yo koci. Veti byattaṁ. Garūnanti sīlādigaruguṇayuttānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:587_1: paṇḍitānaṁ. Vacanaññūti tesaṁ anusāsanīvacanaṁ jānanto, yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0508a21:587_2: paṭipajjitvā ca tassa phalaṁ jānantoti attho. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Vase ca tamhi
atk-s0508a21:587_3: janayetha pemanti tasmiṁ garūnaṁ vacane ovāde vaseyya yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjeyya,
atk-s0508a21:587_4: paṭipajjitvā “iminā vatāhaṁ ovādena imaṁ jātiādidukkhaṁ vītivatto”ti tattha janayetha
atk-s0508a21:587_5: pemaṁ gāravaṁ uppādeyya. Idañhi dvayaṁ “garūnaṁ vacanaññu dhīro”ti padadvayena vuttassevatthassa
atk-s0508a21:587_6: pākaṭakaraṇaṁ. Soti yo garūnaṁ vacanaññū dhīro, so yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipattiyā tattha
atk-s0508a21:587_7: bhattimā ca nāma hoti, jīvitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato paṇḍito ca nāma hoti. Ñatvā
atk-s0508a21:587_8: ca dhammesu visesi assāti tathā paṭipajjanto ca tāya eva paṭipattiyā catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ
atk-s0508a21:588_0: Yanti yaṁ puggalaṁ paṭipattiyā antarāyakaraṇato “āpadā”ti laddhavohārā sotuṇhakhuppipāsādipākaṭaparissayā
atk-s0508a21:588_1: ceva rāgādipaṭicchannaparissayā ca uppatitā uppannā, uḷārā balavantopi nakkhambhayante
atk-s0508a21:588_2: na kiñci cālenti. Kasmā? Paṭisaṅkhayantanti paṭisaṅkhāyamānaṁ paṭisaṅkhānabale ṭhitanti
atk-s0508a21:588_3: attho. Soti yo daḷhatarāhi āpadāhipi akkhambhanīyo, so thāmavā dhitimā daḷhaparakkamo
atk-s0508a21:588_5: ca nāma hoti. Tathābhūto ca ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assāti taṁ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a21:589_0: Samuddovaṭhitoti samuddo viya ṭhitasabhāvo. Yathā hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre
atk-s0508a21:589_1: sinerupādasamīpe mahāsamuddo aṭṭhahipi disāhi uṭṭhitehi pakativātehi aniñjanato ṭhito
atk-s0508a21:589_2: anejo gambhīro ca, evaṁ kilesavātehi titthiyavādavātehi ca akampanīyato ṭhito anejo.
atk-s0508a21:589_3: Gambhīrassa anupacitañāṇasambhārehi aladdhagādhassa nipuṇassa sukhumassa paṭiccasamuppādādiatthassa
atk-s0508a21:589_4: paṭivijjhanena gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī. Asaṁhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito so
atk-s0508a21:589_5: tādiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamārādīsu vā kenaci asaṁhāriyatāya asaṁhāriyo nāma
atk-s0508a21:589_6: hoti, yathāvuttena atthena paṇḍito ca nāma hoti. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a21:590_0: Bahussutoti pariyattibāhusaccavasena bahussuto, suttageyyādi bahuṁ sutaṁ etassāti
atk-s0508a21:590_1: bahussuto. Tameva dhammaṁ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṁ viya avinassantameva
atk-s0508a21:590_2: dhāretīti dhammadharo ca hoti. Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārīti yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa
atk-s0508a21:590_3: dhammassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpaṁ dhammaṁ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0508a21:590_5: hoti, “ajja ajjevā”ti paṭivedhaṁ ākaṅkhanto vicarati. So tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍitoti
atk-s0508a21:590_6: yo puggalo yaṁ garuṁ nissāya bahussuto dhammadharo dhammassa ca anudhammacārī hoti.
atk-s0508a21:590_7: So ca tādiso tena garunā sadiso paṇḍito nāma hoti paṭipattiyā sadisabhāvato. Tathābhūto
atk-s0508a21:590_8: pana so ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa, taṁ vuttatthaṁva.
atk-s0508a21:591_0: Atthañca yo jānāti bhāsitassāti yo puggalo sammāsambuddhena bhāsitassa pariyattidhammassa
atk-s0508a21:591_1: atthaṁ jānāti. Jānanto pana “idha sīlaṁ vuttaṁ, idha samādhi, idha paññā”ti tattha
atk-s0508a21:591_2: tattha yathāvuttaṁ atthañca ñatvāna tathā karoti yathā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṁ, tathā
atk-s0508a21:591_3: paṭipajjati. Atthantaro nāma sa hoti paṇḍitoti so evarūpo puggalo atthantaro atthakāraṇā
atk-s0508a21:591_4: sīlādiatthajānanamattameva upanissayaṁ katvā paṇḍito hoti. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a21:592_0: Ettha ca paṭhamagāthāya “yo ve garūna”ntiādinā saddhūpanissayo visesabhāvo vutto,
atk-s0508a21:592_1: dutiyagāthāya “yaṁ āpadā”ti ādinā vīriyūpanissayo, tatiyagāthāya “yo ve samuddova
atk-s0508a21:592_3: pañcamagāthāya “atthañca yo jānātī”tiādinā paññūpanissayo visesabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.
